com.xith3d.render
Interface StateTrackable

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColoringAttributes, LineAttributes, Material, PolygonAttributes, RenderingAttributes, ShaderProgram, TextureAttributes, Transform3D, TransparencyAttributes
public interface StateTrackable
extends Comparable

Simple interface that allows the renderer to assign a state id to a node. This is used to speed up caching state changes during rendering.

Copyright (c) 2003 David Yazel Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
David Yazel

Method Summary
 StateTrackable getCopy()
          returns a copy of the state of the referenced trackable object.
 StateNode getStateNode()
          retrieves the id of the object.
 void setStateNode(StateNode node)
          Used by the render engine to set the state id for the node
